title: #236: Profiling Bill Cosby, Part 1
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa are joined by award winning investigative journalist Nicki Weisensee Egan, host of the LA Times podcast Chasing Cosby and author of the book of the same name.


You might think you know this case - you really don't. Join us as we deep dive this chilling case and deconstruct how Cosby got away with it for so long.


#VictimsMatter

#WomenMatter

#MaleViolence


Thanks to our sponsor:

VERIFIED

You can listen to Verified right now, and don’t forget to subscribe in Stitcher,Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you listen
